New Records: Arshdeep Singh became the first Indian bowler to bowl a hat-trick of no-balls in a T20I, taking his no-ball tally to 12 in 22 T20Is
Key Match Events: Arshdeep Singh's first over saw three no-balls, allowing Sri Lanka to score 55 runs without losing a wicket in the powerplay
Miscellaneous Highlights: Arshdeep Singh missed the first T20I due to illness but recovered to play in the second match
